rewrite1:
Please make the following updates to the document formatting:

- In the sixth paragraph, set the Outline Level to 'Level 2' and modify the line spacing to 'Single'.
- For the initial paragraph, configure the Outline Level as 'Body Text' and enlarge the font to 36 points. Underline the text and establish a right indent of 2 centimeters.
- Regarding the text you've selected, increase the space before the paragraph to the equivalent of one line and set the spacing after to 2.5 lines. Reduce the font size to 48 points and apply a highlight with the color corresponding to the hex code #0000FF.

- Regarding the selected text, configure the paragraph to have a one-line spacing before and a 2.5-line spacing after. Reduce the font size to 48 points and apply a highlight with the color corresponding to hex code #0000FF.
rewrite3:
Please proceed with the following formatting changes to the document:

- In the sixth paragraph, modify the Outline Level to Level 2, and set the line spacing to Single.
- For the initial paragraph, designate the Outline level as 'Body Text', enlarge the text to a 36-point font, underline it, and establish a right indent of 2 centimeters.
